changes.title: Add MVP generalist multi-agent personas
changes.description: Added agent-generalist.json and 3 identical generalist agents (agent-2, agent-3, agent-4) for multi-agent coordination. All agents can handle any task (code, tests, docs) assigned by Lloyd via communication.json protocol. Replaces specialized personas with flexible execution agents that can be refined over time.
changes.reason: MVP should focus on communication.json protocol and basics. All agents start as generalists and can be specialized as system evolves.
changes.impact: Users can now activate 3 execution agents that work with Lloyd for parallel task execution

changes.title: Initial release with 4 expert personas
changes.description: Created personas-mcp server with 4 independent expert personas: mcp-expert, docs-expert, coderef-expert, nfl-scraper-expert. Each provides 1000-6000+ line system prompts designed for agentic use.
changes.reason: Enable AI assistants to activate expert personas with specialized domain knowledge
changes.impact: Users can activate expert personas via MCP tools to influence AI behavior and tool usage
